title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integrated AI Agents: Moving Beyond Summarization to Automation (AIM207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 集成式AI代理：从摘要总结迈向自动化 (AIM207)
abstract: Every leader knows that AI matters, but we're all still learning exactly how. Siloed business data has been the main obstacle - but no more. Learn how DevRev solves this problem, unifying existing structured data like tickets, backlogs, and CRMs with unstructured data like emails, chats, and documents into an AI-native Knowledge Graph, powering integrated AI agents that create, read, update, and delete, not simply summarize. The result? Happier customers, empowered employees, and finally, ROI from AI. This presentation is brought to you by DevRev, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 每位领导者都知道AI很重要,但我们仍在学习如何准确运用。孤立的业务数据一直是主要障碍——但现在不再是了。了解DevRev如何解决这个问题,将工单、待办事项和CRM等现有结构化数据与电子邮件、聊天和文档等非结构化数据统一到AI原生知识图谱中,为集成AI代理提供支持,这些代理可以创建、读取、更新和删除,而不仅仅是总结。结果如何?更满意的客户、更有能力的员工,以及最终从AI获得的投资回报率。本演示由AWS合作伙伴DevRev为您呈现。
